verses.name: Matthew 24:9
verses.text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted, and shall kill you: and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name’s sake.

verses.name: Matthew 24:10
verses.text: And then shall many be offended, and shall betray one another, and shall hate one another.

verses.name: Matthew 24:11
verses.text: And many false prophets shall rise, and shall deceive many.

verses.name: Matthew 24:12
verses.text: And because iniquity shall abound, the love of many shall wax cold.

verses.name: Matthew 24:13
verses.text: But he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
